comments.author: kaie@kuix.de
comments.creator: kaie@kuix.de
comments.text:
Inspired by the problems we had seen in bug 662557,
I searched for places that should use the PKIX_CHECK macro, in order to update the error class/code variables accordingly.

I'll attach a patch that fixes the places that I found.
